meanings.definition: The illegal transportation or smuggling of firearms.
meanings.sent1: Gunrunning is a serious crime that involves moving guns secretly.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested a group of criminals involved in gunrunning.
meanings.sent3: The bumbling burglars attempted gunrunning but got lost with the weapons.
meanings.sent4: In the dark alleys of the city, whispers of gunrunning echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The news report detailed the dangers of gunrunning and its impact on communities.

meanings.definition: The act of selling or trading guns illegally.
meanings.sent1: Criminals engaged in gunrunning to make quick money.
meanings.sent2: The black market thrived on the business of gunrunning.
meanings.sent3: The undercover agent busted a ring of gunrunning dealers in a sting operation.
meanings.sent4: The shadowy figure in the alley was known for his involvement in gunrunning.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted the dangerous world of gunrunning and its consequences.

meanings.definition: The business of supplying guns to unauthorized individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: Gunrunning networks operate in secrecy to provide weapons to criminals.
meanings.sent2: Authorities cracked down on a major gunrunning operation in the city.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show joked about a failed attempt at gunrunning by amateurs.
meanings.sent4: The novel painted a vivid picture of the underground world of gunrunning.
meanings.sent5: The documentary exposed the inner workings of the gunrunning industry.
